con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${#Project#user}</wsse:Username> </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <Options/>\r <ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:DataExtension" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:CustomerKey>${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:CustomerKey>\r <ns1:Name>DE ${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:Name>\r <ns1:IsSendable>true</ns1:IsSendable>\r <ns1:SendableDataExtensionField>\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:Name>EmailAddress</ns1:Name>\r </ns1:SendableDataExtensionField>\r <ns1:SendableSubscriberField>\r <ns1:Name>Subscriber Key</ns1:Name>\r <ns1:Value>EmailAddress</ns1:Value>\r </ns1:SendableSubscriberField>\r <ns1:Fields>\r <ns1:Field>\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:Name>EmailAddress</ns1:Name>\r <ns1:IsRequired>true</ns1:IsRequired>\r <ns1:FieldType>EmailAddress</ns1:FieldType>\r </ns1:Field>\r <ns1:Field>\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:Name>Region</ns1:Name>\r <ns1:IsRequired>false</ns1:IsRequired>\r <ns1:FieldType>Text</ns1:FieldType>\r </ns1:Field>\r <ns1:Field>\r <ns1:FieldType>Text</ns1:FieldType>\r </ns1:Field>\r </ns1:Fields>\r </ns1:Objects>\r </CreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Filter Definition on Gender
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd">\r <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466">\r <wsse:Username>${#Project#user}</wsse:Username>\r <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${#Project#pass}</wsse:Password>\r </wsse:UsernameToken>\r </wsse:Security>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <Options/>\r <ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:FilterDefinition" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:CustomerKey>${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:CustomerKey>\r <ns1:Name>FD ${Groovy Script to Create Object Name#result}</ns1:Name>\r <ns1:Description>Created via SOAP API</ns1:Description>\r <ns1:DataSource xsi:type="ns1:DataExtension">\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:CustomerKey>${Create Sendable Data Extension#RawRequest#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateRequest[1]/ns1:Objects[1]/ns1:CustomerKey[1]}</ns1:CustomerKey>\r </ns1:DataSource>\r <ns1:DataFilter xsi:type="ns1:SimpleFilterPart">\r <ns1:Property>Gender</ns1:Property>\r <ns1:SimpleOperator>equals</ns1:SimpleOperator>\r <ns1:Value>Female</ns1:Value>\r </ns1:DataFilter>\r </ns1:Objects>\r </CreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Retrieve FilterDef by ObjectID
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${#Project#user}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${#Project#pass}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body>\r <RetrieveRequestMsg xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <RetrieveRequest>\r <ObjectType>FilterDefinition</ObjectType>\r <Properties>ObjectID</Properties>\r <Properties>Client.ID</Properties>\r <Properties>Name</Properties>\r <Properties>DataSource.ListName</Properties>\r <Properties>CustomerKey</Properties>\r <Properties>CreatedDate</Properties>\r <Properties>ModifiedDate</Properties>\r <Properties>Description</Properties>\r <Properties>DataSource.ID</Properties>\r <Properties>DataSource.ObjectID</Properties>\r <Properties>DataSource.Name</Properties>\r <Properties>DataSource.CustomerKey</Properties>\r <Properties>DataSource.CreatedDate</Properties>\r <Properties>DataSource.ModifiedDate</Properties>\r <Properties>DataFilter</Properties>\r <ns1:Filter xsi:type="ns1:SimpleFilterPart" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <ns1:Property>ObjectID</ns1:Property>\r <ns1:SimpleOperator>equals</ns1:SimpleOperator>\r <ns1:Value>${Create Filter Definition on Gender#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateResponse[1]/ns1:Results[1]/ns1:Object[1]/ns1:ObjectID[1]}</ns1:Value>\r </ns1:Filter>\r </RetrieveRequest>\r </RetrieveRequestMsg>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Update Filter Criteria By CustomerKey
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd">\r <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466">\r <wsse:Username>${#Project#user}</wsse:Username>\r <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${#Project#pass}</wsse:Password>\r </wsse:UsernameToken>\r </wsse:Security>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <UpdateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <Options/>\r <ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:FilterDefinition" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:CustomerKey>${Create Filter Definition on Gender#RawRequest#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateRequest[1]/ns1:Objects[1]/ns1:CustomerKey[1]}</ns1:CustomerKey>\r <ns1:DataSource xsi:type="ns1:DataExtension">\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:CustomerKey>${Create Sendable Data Extension#RawRequest#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:CreateRequest[1]/ns1:Objects[1]/ns1:CustomerKey[1]}</ns1:CustomerKey>\r </ns1:DataSource>\r <ns1:DataFilter xsi:type="ns1:SimpleFilterPart">\r <ns1:Property>Gender</ns1:Property>\r <ns1:SimpleOperator>equals</ns1:SimpleOperator>\r <ns1:Value>Prefer not to say</ns1:Value>\r </ns1:DataFilter>\r </ns1:Objects>\r </UpdateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:assertion.name: Match Content of Updated Filter Value
